articles.author: Jan Cronje
articles.title: Fugitive SA crypto developer 'Fluffypony' arrested in the US - News24
articles.description: Authorities in the US have arrested well-known South African cryptocurrency developer Riccardo Spagni after he allegedly fled to the country to escape fraud charges back home that could put him in jail for 20 years
articles.content:
• South African cryptocurrency developer Riccardo "Fluffypony" Spagni has been taken into custody by US Marshals.

articles.title: Meltdown at South African Post Office - MyBroadband
articles.description: The South African Post Office is experiencing a meltdown with branches unable to serve clients, service providers not being paid, and mass branch shutdowns.
articles.content:
The South African Post Office is experiencing a meltdown with branches unable to serve clients, service providers not being paid, and mass branch shutdowns.

articles.title: ESA preps for Venus flybys later this month - htxt.africa
articles.description: While two spacecraft will be coming within spitting distance of Venus, neither is there to study it.
